solution_line_template: Zara will transport a total of {num_groups} * {animals_per_group} = <<{num_groups}*{animals_per_group}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} animals.
The known number of animals is {num_cows} + {num_sheep} = <<{num_cows}+{num_sheep}={known_animals}>>{known_animals} cows and sheep.
